## GeoDistanceFilter interface

Represents a filter by geographical distance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GeoDistanceFilter 
```

## Example

If the name of the field is `position`<!-- -->:

```ts
{
  geo_distance: {
    distance: '200km',
    position: '40,-70'
  }
}

```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [distance](./doofinder.geodistancefilter.distance.md) | string | The distance to the origin of the filter. |
